```
In [1]: df = DataFrame({'created_at' : pd.date_range('20130101',periods=3,tz='US/Eastern'), 'id' : range(3)})

In [2]: df
Out[2]: 
                 created_at  id
0 2013-01-01 00:00:00-05:00   0
1 2013-01-02 00:00:00-05:00   1
2 2013-01-03 00:00:00-05:00   2

# this is what you should do
In [4]: df.created_at.dt.strftime('%Y%m%d')
Out[4]: 
0    20130101
1    20130102
2    20130103
Name: created_at, dtype: object

# very inefficient
In [6]: df.created_at.dt.tz_localize(None).map(lambda d: d.strftime("%Y%m%d"))
Out[6]: 
0    20130101
1    20130102
2    20130103
Name: created_at, dtype: object
```
